message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to make a serious investment in this product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget considerations, but $11,000 is significantly below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
I'm getting closer to your valuation, but I still think $12,000 is a fair price for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to be at $12,000 or less. Can we meet at $12,250?
